nodes.text: Beviin Verhayc was a Mandalorian, who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic's transformation into the Galactic Empire. Verhayc made a living as a craftsman, creating and selling quality Mandalorian helmets, including ones that could be worn by children.
In the year 19 BBY, the veteran Mandalorian soldier Kal Skirata considered approaching Verhayc to build a helmet for his young grandson, Venku Skirata.
Beviin Verhayc was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the novel Order 66, the fourth entry in author Karen Traviss' Republic Commando series, published September 16, 2008.
